description.fr: Vaincre tous les Bworks. \--- {%FightStarted} Invoque un {Summoning:8}\v par héros en jeu. \--- {%FightTurnStarted} Les {Summoning:8,plural:other!} changent d'équipe.
description.en: Defeat all the Bworks. \--- {%FightStarted} Summons one {Summoning:8}\v per hero in play. \--- {%FightTurnStarted} The {Summoning:8,plural:other!} change teams.
description.es: Vencer a todos los bworks. \--- {%FightStarted} Invoca un {Summoning:8}\v por héroe en juego. \--- {%FightTurnStarted} Los {Summoning:8,plural:other!} cambian de equipo.
description.de: Alle Bworks besiegen. \--- {%FightStarted} Beschwört pro Helden im Spiel einen\_{Summoning:8}\v. \--- {%FightTurnStarted} Die {Summoning:8,plural:other!} wechseln das Team.
description.pt: Derrotar todos os Bworks. \--- {%FightStarted} Invoca um {Summoning:8}\v por cada herói em jogo. \--- {%FightTurnStarted} Os {Summoning:8,plural:other!} mudam de equipe.
